description: Let Py(n)=A000330(n)=n-th square pyramidal number. Consider all integer triples (i,j,k), j >= k>0, with Py(i)=Py(j)+Py(k), ordered by increasing i; sequence gives j values.
comments: i values are A053719 and k values are A053721
author: Klaus Strassburger (strass(AT)ddfi.uni-duesseldorf.de), Feb 11 2000
extensions: Crossrefs in comments corrected by _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 17 2012
